features.text: Extensive experience in cloud architecture design, migration, testing, and operations

details.desc: Global agent with high-level discount privileges, offering you maximum benefits.

details.title: No Handling Fees, Transparent Billing

details.desc: Monthly bills issued by the platform, pay according to the bill, avoiding high fees.

details.subtitle: Original technical and professional services
details.desc: Alibaba Cloud certified engineers and official technical support ensure your cloud security.

items.title: Leading Global Cloud Computing
items.desc: Dominant market share in Asia-Pacific, top three in global cloud computing market.

items.title: Cost-effective Computing Resources
items.desc: Compared to AWS and other overseas providers, configuration prices are over 20% lower, suitable for businesses and individuals.

items.title: Rich Global Infrastructure
items.desc: Covers 28 geographic regions worldwide, over 85 availability zones, covering all major areas.

items.title: Comprehensive Product and Service System
items.desc: Complete industry solutions, chosen by billions of users globally, reliable and easy to use, enhancing enterprise efficiency.

discount.title: Promotional Activities
discount.subtitle: Start a New Cloud Journey, Lead the Future!
discount.desc: Join now to enjoy great discounts and let your enterprise soar in the cloud!

cards.0: Local data centers have become critical infrastructure in the digital age, comparable in importance to roads, railways, and bridges. Alibaba Cloud continuously invests in building stable and reliable global data centers, collaborating with local ecosystem partners to provide localized solutions that solve customer pain points. It has become the cloud provider with the most data centers and CDN nodes in the Asia-Pacific region.
cards.1: Providing reliable and user-friendly cloud services, globally intelligent big data, integrated IoT, and mobile collaboration anytime, anywhere. Alibaba Cloud offers multiple industry-specific and general solutions, fully empowering enterprises. To date, it has served more than 3 million customers in over 200 countries and regions worldwide.
cards.2: Alibaba Cloud provides a series of China Gateway solutions to help overseas clients enter and grow rapidly in China. With a complete suite of products and services, it offers one-stop support from company registration to IT infrastructure setup. Additionally, Alibaba Cloud helps overseas clients integrate into the Alibaba ecosystem and brings them into the Chinese market through global partnerships.
cards.3: With extensive experience protecting Alibaba Group's security, Alibaba Cloud helps clients defend against various threats. Its built-in cloud security capabilities meet global compliance standards, making it the most certified cloud provider in Asia, committed long-term to personal data privacy protection.

mobileCards.0: Local data centers have become essential infrastructure for digital-era cities, comparable to finance, railways, and bridges. Alibaba Cloud continues investing in front-line data centers and building ecosystems with local partners to provide localized solutions for key business scenarios. It is the provider with the most data centers and CDN nodes in the Asia-Pacific region.
mobileCards.1: Delivering reliable, easy-to-use cloud services, globally intelligent big data, integrated IoT, and flexible mobile collaboration. Alibaba Cloud provides both industry-specific and general-purpose solutions to comprehensively empower businesses, serving over 3 million customers in more than 200 countries and regions.
mobileCards.2: Alibaba Cloud offers a range of China Gateway solutions to help overseas clients enter and scale quickly in China. With comprehensive services, it supports needs from company registration to network setup and cross-border infrastructure. It also helps overseas clients integrate into the Alibaba ecosystem and enter the China market with global partners.
mobileCards.3: Alibaba Cloud has extensive experience in safeguarding Alibaba Group, helping clients counter various threats. As the leading cloud provider in Asia for security compliance, Alibaba Cloud meets global standards and is committed to long-term protection of personal privacy.

activity.desc: Join now for incredible offers and take your business to the cloud!

steps.title: Pre-sales Consultation
steps.desc_cn: 多种渠道联系客户经理，沟通您的业务需求。
steps.desc_en: Connect with an account manager through multiple channels to communicate your business needs.

steps.title: Business Communication
steps.desc_cn: 明确需求与预算，协助您在云官网选购产品和服务，并获取折扣优惠。
steps.desc_en: Clarify your needs and budget, and assist you in purchasing products and services on the cloud official website. Take the discount offer.

steps.title: Prepayment
steps.desc_cn: 预估月消费，预付款到九途，支持全渠道支付方式。
steps.desc_en: Estimate monthly consumption, prepay to Jiutu, support omni-channel payment methods.

steps.title: Account Registration
steps.desc_cn: 协助您注册阿里云国际账号，并挂靠到九途云组织下
steps.desc_en: Assist you in registering an Alibaba Cloud international account and attaching it to the Jiutu Cloud organization.

steps.title: Billing Review
steps.desc_cn: 每月平台自动出具月账单，并完成开票。
steps.desc_en: Every month, the platform automatically issues monthly bills and completes invoicing.

steps.title: Customer Follow-up
steps.desc_cn: 每月沟通业务情况，了解您的实时需求。
steps.desc_en: Communicate your business situation on a monthly basis to understand your real-time needs.

connect.title: Contact Us
connect.cooperation: I want to cooperate with Jiutu

form.placeholder: Please describe your project, including any specific requirements, target date, and scenarios.

video.title: Video Acceleration & Cross-border Live Streaming

block2.title: Top Performance Support
items: Daily active users: up to 10 million
Instant startup: as fast as one step

issues: Latency and buffering in cross-border live streaming
Stability and standardization of live streams
video.scheme: The cloud architecture leverages globally distributed data centers and CDN technology to deliver high-performance computing and scalability, supporting high concurrency and low-latency live streaming. Cross-border streaming is stabilized through intelligent routing and link optimization. Proprietary streaming tools enable real-time video editing and segmentation for diverse scenarios. AI-powered analytics ensure seamless content delivery. 24/7 technical support guarantees system stability and rapid issue resolution.

game.title: Game Global Expansion

advantages.title: Solution Advantages
items: High availability through application monitoring and automated traffic scheduling
Easy deployment with instant setup and unified global resource monitoring

problems.title: Challenges Addressed
items: Poor login experience, including slow or unstable logins
Slow downloads of game packages and updates across regions

issues: Latency and packet loss, access speed
game.scheme: Cloud providers deploy data centers in major global regions to ensure game servers are close to players, reducing latency and packet loss. Rapid scaling supports traffic peaks during global expansion. DDoS protection, data security, and anti-cheating services safeguard games from attacks. CDN accelerates content distribution, reducing load times and enhancing global access speed.

website.title: Independent Website
issues: Ensuring website stability during traffic peaks and streamlining the site-building process
website.scheme: Independent sites may face traffic fluctuations, especially during promotions or special events. Cloud servers offer elastic scaling to dynamically adjust resources like CPU and memory, ensuring stable website operation. Rapid deployment and configuration support quick launches and iterations. Some cloud providers offer one-click setup services, simplifying the site-building process.

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.description: Jiutu's global cloud marketplace brings together leading partners to support all major blockchain protocols, including over 70 verified blockchain and distributed ledger technology solutions.

cards.title: Quantum Ledger Database
cards.content: A fully managed ledger database designed to provide a transparent, immutable, and cryptographically verifiable transaction log. It includes a built-in journal that stores a complete and sequential history of data changes, allowing only appends without overwrites or deletions.

cards.title: Managed Blockchain
cards.content: A fully managed service that enables you to easily join public networks or create and manage scalable private networks using Hyperledger Fabric and Ethereum. Start using blockchain by creating an AWS account.

guide.title: User Guide
items: Create EC2 & Deploy with BT Panel

collect.title: 1. Information Collection
content: We may collect your information in the following situations:
Online inquiry or form submission: name, contact info (email, phone, etc);
Analytics data: browser, IP address, access time, visited pages, etc;
Information collected through Telegram, WeChat, or other support channels.

use.title: 2. Use of Information
content: Collected information may be used for:
Providing Alibaba Cloud account setup, deployment, and consulting services;

share.title: 3. Sharing and Disclosure
content: We do not sell or disclose your personal info unless:
Required by service providers (e.g., Alibaba Cloud);
Required by hosting or technical service providers.

cookie.title: 4. Cookies & Tracking
cookie.content: We use cookies and analytics to track usage. You may disable this in browser settings.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or loss.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data. Please contact us via the methods below.

thirdparty.title: 7. Third-Party Links
thirdparty.content: Our site may contain links to external sites. Please refer to their privacy policies before use.

minor.title: 8. Minors
minor.content: This site is intended for adults. If you are a minor, please browse with guardian supervision.

change.title: 9. Policy Changes
change.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions, contact us via:
